website_summaries.verdict: Great for those who already know what they're doing and just need some stainless decorator tips.
pros: 52-piece set includes two flower nails, a coupler, and a plastic case
cons: Includes a coupler but no pastry bags or instruction book

customer_reviews.title: Nice durable set with many different size tips.
customer_reviews.text: Was worried about purchasing the Russian tips that are not numbered. I read through the reviews and decided to give them a try. I like the way they are packaged. It's a very nice kit with all the different sizes and tips you need to decorate. I decorated a wedding cake last week using this set. I had no issues with the tips or cleaning them. I would recommend this for anyone. If you are a beginner and you are worried about not having numbered tips, don't worry. Cake decorating is about creativity. Have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tip that this collection of Tips worked for us....
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves to make cup cakes to donate to seniors and shelters, this collection did add a new dimension to what she could create. The recipients enjoyed her creations. It would be helpful if the collection included a chart with the flow pattern of each tip. However the tip numbers appeared to us to use a standard tip number that we could look up and make our own chart.
customer_reviews.author: Bagel Man

customer_reviews.title: Good value, love this set
customer_reviews.text: Love this set!! Great value. The tips are strong metal, coupler works fine, big tips work for cupcakes. The tips have sat in my sink for a day and been stored in the fridge and been fine ( not that you're supposed to do that). The isn't a sheet or anything included to explain the tips but nothing you can't look up. And there's a chance the lid will pop open so I keep a rubber band around it.
customer_reviews.author: Ss

customer_reviews.title: Gift worthy
customer_reviews.text: The package came wrapped very nicely. It came undamaged. All the pieces seem great. Yeah they're not Wilton tips but they get the job done. I bought a set earlier and I loved them so much I had to buy another set for my mom. To my surprise it came with a piping bag! I didn't read the description but it was a very nice surprise. I love them very much. Hope my mom loves it just as much!
customer_reviews.author: vito

customer_reviews.title: An outlet for your creative side
customer_reviews.text: This set of piping tips allows me the opportunity for creative expression on everything from appetizers to desserts. I use them on cakes, cupcakes, deviled eggs, and savory vegetable smashes. My skill level is slowly increasing but it is a way to create a fun presentation. They are well made. The set includes a variety of types and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: gingergal

customer_reviews.title: Good price for piping tips kit
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piping kit. It makes making cakes so much fun. Good for the price. The metal is bendable but as long as you don’t squeeze the tips they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Meyer family

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of tips because it was a great price for Russian piping tips. The problem is it was a gift so it wasn't opened until today 10/18. These are not Russian tips. They are knock off Wilton tips,not the expected Russian style of tips. The description is very misleading and I was embarrassed when the gift was opened because not only was the item not what I expected but the case was broken on one corner and the lid hinges were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I used to do cake decorating years ago, and lost all of my equipment somewhere between moves. I was glad to receive this because I can try to start again on the decorating. I just have to remember how! The set came in excellent condition. I just wish it had instructions as to which tips you use for what design.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Lady

customer_reviews.title: true to their word
customer_reviews.text: i bought this set of tips from this seller because they said their tips were numbered and really are. as with another seller they said they were numbered and werent. i have a lot of new tips and some duplicates which is perfect for using the same thing in a different color. love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: But good quality tips
customer_reviews.text: Received with the case broken. But good quality tips..terrible case.
customer_reviews.author: brandycr10

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. The tips are seamless, durable, and there's a great variety! I was looking for a set with bigger tips for cakes, and tiny ones for detailed sugar cookies. This set has them all. I'm so glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: ... and such the quality of the tips were way better then expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price and such the quality of the tips were way better then expected. I have zero complaint and am perfectly happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: TommyT

customer_reviews.title: beginners to experts
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I've never used anything like this before and these are pretty awesome the only down side is you still have to buy icing bags. The tips are easy to clean and I love the case.. I look forward to more icing creations to come
customer_reviews.author: Shelbi

customer_reviews.title: Variety and quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful kit with lots of variety! I haven't gotten a chance to use them quite yet as I have been busy, but I am very excited! They look great!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my niece for Christmas & she absolutely loves them. I was very happy with how quickly they got here, how safely they were packed & their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They have numbers marked, they come with all accessories needed for a starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: chelms

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Great set. My first cake looked good. I wish it had examples of the design each tip makes but for the price I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: It was a good set but the case came broken
customer_reviews.text: It was a good set but the case came broken. We still want it, just not broken, unfortunately the price went up and we can't get it at the original price we purchased it at. This was supposed to be a Christmas present for our daughter and we now have to figure something else out. Very Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Sister
customer_reviews.text: Like I said about the other kit it is for my sister. She likes it.
customer_reviews.author: buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: very nice...... excellent and exactly as described..... would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PMGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tips and the case is a perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tips and the case is a perfect way to keep them from being damaged or just rolling around in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schnorr

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cakes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my granddaughter. She is learning to decorate cakes. Easy to use. Makes really pretty designs. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Tips are great case not so much
customer_reviews.text: The tips are great but the case cracked after the first time opening and closing it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product about a week ago and came in the mail today, I'm glad I did that because I am more than pleased with it... In the beginning I was insecure about getting this because it looks cheap in the pictures but after receiving my order I changed my Mind.. Get it is great quality and for the price you cannot go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the different designs you can make and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the chance to use these tips this past week. Love all the different designs you can make and the case is perfect for holding everything
customer_reviews.author: lsc

customer_reviews.title: Look great. Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Look great. Perfect for what I needed, though I wish it had a grass tip.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love baking and these piping tips work really well. I have no complaints. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice set, have not used it yet. Has a nice variety of tips.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian S

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful! I am not a professional baker
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I am not a professional baker, but I enjoy baking for fun. I love that they are not flimsy, very sturdy. Reading some other reviews about the storage box that it comes in being broken, mine was not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone. She absolutely loves it. Has all the tips and more that she needs to decorate cakes. Her case is holding up well and she was so happy to be able to store the tips together in an organized manner. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of icing tips
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of icing tips!! Especially great for a first timer - this set has EVERYTHING and they are stored so neatly in the box! Only wish there were more of the plastic securers, but I'll just have to buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E

customer_reviews.title: Ready to create!
customer_reviews.text: They are Awesome, and I feel I got an Amazing deal for them...totally satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality~! They came as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality~! They came as pictured. I found that I dont need them as much, but the cost for this was just too perfect
customer_reviews.author: hanna kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! This is a super set and the best of all was the price. The tips are gorgeous and they are a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Farida Rone

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have no compliant as about this product. The tips are sturdy and numerous. The price was good when compared to similar products. Overall this worked well for a beginner in icing decoration.

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice assortment. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the chance to use these tips yet. It is a very nice assortment. Fast delivery!!! Can't wait to use them!!!

customer_reviews.text: Havw not got to use these yet but they are as described Nice case Looks great. Hope to use this weekend

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and quantity will put all to good use.

customer_reviews.title: Shrink and bubble wrapped but......
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and can't wait to use them! But I'm really bummed that the tray arrived cracked :(

customer_reviews.title: These tips are very nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These tips are very nice quality for the price! So glad I ordered them. I tested them out and they do just as well as the more expensive brands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY USEFUL
customer_reviews.text: Very useful,if you cannot find what u need inside this set,then you shouldn't be icing....very useful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time. However plastic case containing tips has one of the corner hinges completely broken off.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic set of pastry tips box is pretty durable better then I expected

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!!! Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well! Love this set. My first time making these Batman cookies n couldn't of asked for a better result!

customer_reviews.title: and the product quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I got the product at time, and the product quality is good

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my order and the short time it took to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. Has the basic pipping tips and them some and is organized nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These tips are fun to use and make decorating easy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, usable, dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.text: These tips are pretty solid. The plastic compression fitting is difficult to remove and the lid doesn't close because the tips don't all fit in properly. The two metal plates causes the lid to be "off" so don't expect too much. I mean, this is a cheap set.
customer_reviews.author: CLC

customer_reviews.title: Coupler doesn't fit all tips
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this set comes with 4 large tips and only one regular size coupler which doesn't even fit the large tips. Also the hinge on the case arrived broken. Besides these things, the set is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey & Ric

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very excited to give this as a Christmas Present this year. Exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: received plastic container broken. not enough packaging to protect item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for a great price. Not cheaply made and just what I needed to make my daughters 5th birthday cake and I'm sure many more cakes. It would've been nice to have a sample picture of how each tip made the frosting look. It was difficult deciding which tips to use for certain projects but with a Google search it worked out. Also maybe some instructions for newbies? When I first started a made quite a mess because the bags came out of the tip. I learned you had to cut slips in the bag and fold it over the cap and then screw on the tip to help hold the bag in place. Maybe I'm just an idiot.
customer_reviews.author: Missanator

customer_reviews.title: The tip that I used was really good. This set will work good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about a month ago and I just opened it yesterday. When I opened the plastic, the box was broken and a couple of pieces were missing. The tip that I used was really good. This set will work good, but is not made like the Wilton. For the price, it's a good set.
customer_reviews.author: Cazares

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for a friend for her class.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend for her cake decorating class. I also tried them while helping her with roses. I have a wilton set. However, The best roses i ever made was with the 104 tip from this set. The thin part of the opening is somewhat different slightly wider and i love it. Great tips. But I don't like the case.
customer_reviews.author: JHH

customer_reviews.title: Tips, tips and more tips!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness was this is a wonderful assortment of piping tips. So many different kinds to experiment with. Very well made, not flimsy at all. I will be using this set for a long time I'm sure of that. The case that the tips are stored in was a hard plastic with a see through lid. I'm so glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: These tips are just as good as any expensive brand but are much more affordable
customer_reviews.text: These tips are just as good as any expensive brand but are much more affordable. With these tips, I am achieving the same results as people who paid 2 or 3 times more. I do a lot of home baking and many people assume I buy my decorated cupcakes from a bakery, because I am able to achieve professional-looking results.. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MissyC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality decorating tips for less money
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy that I chose to buy this instead of one of the more expensive sets. As far as I can tell these have the same quality and all the tips are numbered, which is very convenient. I have no complaints at all. I'm working on cookie decorating techniques - I'm no professional, so this is great for a starter that doesn't want to drop tons of money on a hobby.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, nice case
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Perhaps the most useful thing is to have a nice case to keep them organized. I hated my ziplock of loose tips. I ended up writing the numbers on the outside of the case to make it easier to grab what I need when baking. That would have been a nice touch, but took me less than 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: aih

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? They're piping tips.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set for the money, a bit "chinsier" then Ateco, but for the price they're fine. Its nice to get a fresh new set every once in a while. (like a new box of crayons) Totally affordable. As good as anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Seashell OsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are different sizes of many tips here
customer_reviews.text: Options! I love that there are different sizes of many tips here. The most common designs come in 2-3 sizes for your convenience. The coupler is great. Decorate anything from cookies to large sheet cakes with this kit. No limit to what you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Signature Moves

customer_reviews.title: Excellent selection
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my granddaughter so it hasn't been used yet but it looks fantastic. Nice storage case to keep all the parts together and a huge selection for maximum creativity. Can't wait to see what she comes up with!
customer_reviews.author: Stonyb

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not an expert baker just as a hobby and you get a lot for your money. I wish they had a chart to show what each tip does, but I just looked up Wilton tip chart and went off of that.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great and comes in a handy little box to store everything.
customer_reviews.author: Gem-mama

customer_reviews.title: The product is very good. But the seller needs to make sure that ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good. But the seller needs to make sure that they send the correct item. I received a 52 piece. But ordered a 57 piece. But again the product is good and would recommend it to others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hestand

customer_reviews.title: Cake tips
customer_reviews.text: Everything is nice about rabbits item except for the few big cake tips. The tips do not have a big enough bag to fit on. Also, it would be nice to have a card with the pieces name on them.
customer_reviews.author: laboo

customer_reviews.title: We have spent a few hours with them and pleased in every way
customer_reviews.text: This set of tips are well worth the money. We have spent a few hours with them and pleased in every way. We would like to encourage all people that use decorating tips to place an order ASAP !!! The possibilities with them are endless. The only way they could be possibly better is to have detailed DVD's. Thank you so much for the Quality products. We sure did get a lot of comments on our cupcakes at the last show we were at !!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Cox

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are such an awesome value for the price! The tips are well constructed and offer a fabulous variety, though some fundamental tips weren't included. The tips are clearly labeled and help me create beautiful cakes! Highly recommended for anyone looking to get into decorating or to add some new tips to their aresenal.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and range of tips!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, great range of Rio shapes and sizes! Better than other options, and great value. Note: tips are numbered, only negative is that numbering is fairly small, so not as easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great tips, cheap box.
customer_reviews.text: These tips are great! No complaints thus far about the tips themselves, but I'm not too impressed with the box. Mine wouldn't latch right out of the package, but it was easily solved with a rubber band.
customer_reviews.author: Irene B.

customer_reviews.title: More for your buck
customer_reviews.text: So many tips! I love these because I always end up with ton of little bits and pieces and this is a perfect one place where I can now find all decorating tips. Quality is average.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Really complete set.
customer_reviews.text: Has pretty much any tip you could need, plus flower nails, cleaning brush, and the piping bag is nice and sturdy. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect gift for someone who is learning cake decorating

product_meta.title: Piping Tips, MCIRCO Cake Decorating Supplies 57-piece Stainless Steel Cookies Cupcake Decorating Kits Frosting Icing Tips Baking Tools with Flower Nail Pastry Bag Icing Coupler and Hinged Storage Box
product_meta.description:
About us 
MCIRCO is a professional Home& Kitchen product supplier.
We focus on supplying all kinds of quality, stylish and attractive items to help improve customers' high quality life.
We devote ourselves to improving customers' on-line shopping experience.

Product highlights
MCIRCO 57 pieces piping set is a wonderful addition to any kitchen. 
Made of a strong, durable, substantial stainless steel , very safe to use. 
Well designed for easy assemble gather and effortless clean up, one step to bake for new beginners and the professional ones.

Package included
48 stainless steel piping tips 
4 larger size tips 
2 flower nails 
1 standard coupler
1 silicone bag
1 cleaning brush
1 plastic storage box

Cleaning Notice
Please hand wash only after your use. 
Choose soft tools and mild detergent when you clean tips to keep them twinkling. 
Avoid sharp and rough tools to scratch the surface.

Warranty
We provide a 6-month warranty for every purchase from MCIRCO. 

If you need any help
Just please “Contact Seller” directly from Amazon Buyer Center against your order #.
We will take care of you within 24 hours.
feature_bullets: SAVE YOUR MONEY AND TIME: 48 stainless steel piping tips + 4 larger tips + 2 flower nails + 1 standard coupler+1 reusable silicone bag+ 1 cleaning brush

SAFE AND DECENT HIGH QUALITY:Tips are made of 18/8 stainless steel. Seamless and one piece design. The coupler is made of PP plastic; the bag is made of food-grade silicone. BPA free. Reusable, non-stick, tasteless, nontoxic.

CHECK THE SPECIFICATIONS BEFORE YOUR PURCHASE:48 nozzles diameter: 0.67”; length: 0.98”-1.50”; 4 nozzles diameter: 0.98”, length: 1.57”-1.77”. 12 inch bag fits any size tips after proper trimming. Coupler is compatible with any standard tips.
NEAT AND TIDY WITH A STORAGE BOX: Includes a plastic storage cake decoration tool box.Easy for your storage and carrying.

BEAUTIFUL CAKE DECORATIONS FOR BEGINNERS AND EXPERT BAKERS:Create beautiful icing swirls,rosettes,flowers,roping,stars,leaves and other designs by these 52 decorating tips and your imagination. IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM, JUST CONTACT SELLER AGAINST YOUR ORDER#.
